meta.description: The specific apostolic decrees regarding the order of the bishops and the celebration of the Eucharist.

verses.text: When the number of the faithful increased, the Apostles chose seven men of good report to serve the tables of the widows.
This is the order of the diaconate, which shall endure until the Lord returns in His glory.

chapters.name: The Great Prayer of the Night

verses.text: At the hour of midnight, let the faithful arise and wash their hands and pray, for at this hour the heavenly hosts give praise.
If thou art in the company of thy wife, pray together; for you are one flesh and one spirit in the Lord.
